question:
Bowie extols mountain biking. Oluwafemi finds fulfillment in trains. Aleksandar embraces theatre. Conlly welcomes sailplanes. Jonny dotes ecology. Aleksandr is nuts about scooters. Zein is keen on robotics. Adegbola craves crocodiles. Rana glories in the color olive. Liam prefers modern architecture. Rana disdains metaphysics. Seaan derides ducks. John-Paul admires snowmobiles. Darn adores the color aquamarine. Tommy mocks hippopotamuses. Kevan disdains luxury sedans. Diarmaid is neutral toward camping trailers. Saghun covets pizza. Cassy dislikes geography. Caethan stomachs segways. Lenny idolizes tacos. Anthony-John overlooks the color burgundy. Kaleb thrives on philosophy. Joynul fancies skateboarding. Branden exults in the color lime. Archie is partial to barbecue. Eiddon curses geocaching. Bob exults the color lilac. Tai eschews the color yellow. Yuanyu treasures parkour. Brandan scorns pasta. Hogan is indifferent to the color mint. Jole delights in playing the clarinet. Brandyn savors experimental theater. Titi worships the color khaki. Xida shuns scrapbooking. Caleb esteems waffles. Kevin craves sewing. 
Who esteems waffles? Reply with a name enclosed within triple angle brackets, like <<<name>>>.
